price: 61. Waa la nacladay, meel kastoo laga helo, waa la qab-qaban oo la layn leyn daran.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
